member.name: M:FurryPotato.Core.TestCore
member.summary: This method tests Core class as a singleton. Only for testing purposes

example.code: var _core = GetNode("/root/Core"); GD.Print(_core.TestCore() ? "Core works!" : "Core is not working!");

member.name: M:FurryPotato.Main.MainMenu.OnStartNewGameButtonPressed
member.summary: Method called when "Start new game" button was pressed. Shows popup for new game name and starts a new game

member.name: M:FurryPotato.Main.MainMenu.OnContinueGameButtonPressed
member.summary: Method called when "Continue game" button was pressed. Continues last played save

member.name: M:FurryPotato.Main.MainMenu.OnLoadGameButtonPressed
member.summary: Method called when "Load game" button was pressed. Shows menu with list of saves to load game from

member.name: M:FurryPotato.Main.MainMenu.OnOptionsButtonPressed
member.summary: Method called when "Options" button was pressed. Shows option menu

member.name: M:FurryPotato.Main.MainMenu.OnExitButtonPressed
member.summary: Method called when "Exit" button was pressed. Quits the game
